alert.note: Alert for Ness; Pawnee; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Ness, northwestern Pawnee and southwestern Rush Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bazine, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bazine around 225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Alexander and Nekoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
